Calisthenics.Description: A calisthenics workout routine that targets different muscle groups using bodyweight exercises.

Push-ups.Description: Classic calisthenics exercise for chest, triceps, and shoulders.
Push-ups.Sets_and_Reps: 3 sets of 10 reps, with 30 seconds rest between sets

Pike push-ups.Description: Elevated push-ups for shoulders and upper chest.
Pike push-ups.Sets_and_Reps: 3 sets of 8 reps, with 30 seconds rest between sets

Handstand push-ups.Description: Advanced exercise for shoulder strength and balance.
Handstand push-ups.Sets_and_Reps: 3 sets of max reps, with 30 seconds rest between sets

Chin-ups.Description: Pull-ups with palms facing you for biceps and back.
Chin-ups.Sets_and_Reps: 3 sets of 8 reps, with 30 seconds rest between sets

Bench dips.Description: Triceps exercise using a bench or chair.
Bench dips.Sets_and_Reps: 3 sets of 12 reps, with 30 seconds rest between sets

Wrist curls.Description: Exercise for flexor muscles of the forearms.
Wrist curls.Sets_and_Reps: 2 sets of 15 reps, with 30 seconds rest between sets

Pull-ups.Description: Exercise for lats, biceps, and core.
Pull-ups.Sets_and_Reps: 3 sets of 8 reps, with 30 seconds rest between sets

Back extensions.Description: Exercise for erector spinae, glutes, and hamstrings.
Back extensions.Sets_and_Reps: 2 sets of 15 reps, with 30 seconds rest between sets

Squats.Description: Exercise for quads, glutes, hamstrings, and calves.
Squats.Sets_and_Reps: 3 sets of 10 reps, with 30 seconds rest between sets

Glute-ham raises.Description: Exercise for hamstrings, glutes, and calves.
Glute-ham raises.Sets_and_Reps: 3 sets of 10 reps, with 30 seconds rest between sets

Hip thrusts.Description: Exercise for glutes, hamstrings, and quads.
Hip thrusts.Sets_and_Reps: 3 sets of 12 reps, with 30 seconds rest between sets

Additional_Information.Frequency: You can do these exercises every 45 minutes.
